message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think will be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $13,000, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $11,500 to make this work. This is a fair price considering the value of this product to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand your position, I still believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
